mapper.select: select id, username, password, portrait, regist_date, online_state, gender, email from t_user
select id, username, password, portrait, regist_date, online_state, gender, email from t_user where id = #{id}
select id, username, password, portrait, regist_date, online_state, gender, email from t_user where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, username, password, online_state, portrait, regist_date, gender, email) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{onlineState}, #{portrait}, #{registerDate}, #{gender}, #{email})
mapper.update: update t_user set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, online_state = #{onlineState}, portrait = #{portrait}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email} where id = #{id}
